reviews.text: The curriculum is incredibly well-structured and holistic; It goes beyond classroom learning and includes practical exposure, case-based discussions, and industry-aligned content.
I've grown not just as a student but also as a confident future pharmacist.
Focus on the GPAT examination with dedicated study materials and mock tests set a whole new level of clarity and depth.
